name: Solarstic
description: Developer of ultra-lightweight, design-flexible solar modules for vehicles and industrial rooftops, spun out from Hyundai Motor's internal solar system team. The company operates a proprietary plastic encapsulation and injection molding process that replaces conventional glass solar panels, enabling scalability and carbon-credit alignment across mobility and RE100 manufacturing use cases.
one_liner: Developer of ultra-lightweight, design-flexible solar modules for vehicles and industrial rooftops, spun out from Hyundai Motor's internal solar system team. The company operates a proprietary plastic encapsulation and injection molding process that replaces conventional glass solar panels, enabling scalability and carbon-credit alignment across mobility and RE100 manufacturing use cases.
